description: TimePicker allows users to select a time value using either a scroll-based wheel picker or a dropdown list of time options.

value.description: Current time value (HH:mm string format or Date object)

onChange.description: Callback fired when the time changes
onChange.type: (value: string | null, date: Date | null) => void

mode.description: Picker mode: scroll (wheel columns) or dropdown (time list)

step.description: Step interval in minutes for dropdown mode

placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the input field

open.description: Controls the open state of the picker panel (controlled mode)

onOpenChange.description: Callback fired when the panel open state changes

aria-label.description: Accessible label for the time picker input

name.description: Name attribute for the hidden input (for form submission)

id.description: ID attribute for the input element
